title: We are changing the way people enjoy
careers: Are you a passionate tech talent? We look forward to hearing from you!

team.name: Christian Bongardt
team.content: He is a tech enthusiast with real passion for innovation and growth. He makes sure all our tech projects run smoothly and brings all the pieces together. From concept to creation Christian plays a vital role in every product we launch.

team.name: Lara Corral
team.content:
She loves mothering her daughter, Flamenco dancing and when possible goes on a friends trip.

Lara oversees office operations, is in charge of invoicing, transaction of aids and subventions as well as coordinates business trips.

team.name: Nagib Adum
team.content: Entrepreneur and arts advocate with 10+ years Ecuadorian market experience. Nagim is a professional Business Administrator with extensive experience and always willing to take on new challenges.

team.name: Rafa Corral
team.content:
He enjoys sports and spends time with family and friends

Rafa is in charge of the entire sales cycle, building and strengthening partnerships as well as client management.

team.name: Cristina Edo
team.content:
She lives and breathes music as well as enjoys capturing trip memories.

Cristina is the events business development manager, provides operational support and manages teams at festivals and events.

team.name: Hector Fernández
team.content:
He loves audiovisuals, is eager to learn from other cultures and likes making plans for rich and authentic experiences.

Hector is primarly a backend developer.

team.name: Alejandro Gálvez
team.content:
He is a coffee fan, likes painting pocket figures and listening to podcasts.

Alejando is responsible for app development as well as training while providing support to big events.

team.name: Benjamín Garcés
team.content:
He loves basketball and spending time with family and friends

Benjamin is the CEO and is in charge of managing and making strategic decisions in addition to pinpoint annual objectives and briefs the team with the results.

team.name: Ramiro Gordillo
team.content: He is a musicophile and piano instructor who enjoys spending time with his family.Ramiro manages and grows South American client portfolio as well as collaborations with potential partners.

team.name: Marina Granell
team.content:
She is one of our lovely veggies, always surrounded by cactus and enjoys cosplaying in her spare time.

Among her main duties stands out interface design, user experience, as well as frontend development.

team.name: Silvia Juarez
team.content:
She is a hybrid designer (product and digital)

Silvia has passion for travelling the world and anime, as well as working on DIY projects whenever she gets some spare time.

team.name: María Martínez
team.content:
She is one of our lovely veggies and always carries with her a bag full of nuts, a big fan of crossfit and adores Rosco, her little doggy.

Maria's main duties are Backend and Android Development.

team.name: Alan Moradi
team.content:
He's got a keen interest in photography, travelling and sci-fi films. br>
Alan's major tasks are new sales channels management, business development management, and keep up to date with the full product portfolio.

team.name: Elena Moreno
team.content:
She fully embraces new technologies and has particular interest in how they are shaping social paradigm, beach and photography are other her hobbies

Elena's tasks are to optimize resources in order to get best results and market development.

team.name: Iván Muñoz
team.content:
He is a fan of extreme sports, loves cooking and is forever in love with music<.br>
Iván has various duties, a few of them are event project management, client liaison and provides advice to them when needed.

team.name: Daniel Olivera
team.content:
He's got passion for windsurf, tennis and high-altitude trekking.

Daniel is our main partner in charge of event management as well as set-up our solutions for leisure and hospitality industries.

team.name: Miguel Salas
team.content:
He is an Apple enthusiast and premiere movies lover. When outside you'll probably find him looking at surrounding dogs.

Miguel's main responsibilities are project management, development team management as well as back end development.

team.name: Sergio Tena
team.content:
He loves travelling and playing some sports.

Sergio is the head of operations department and is in charge of helping other departments achieve their objectives, as well as provide the company with needful insights for decision making.

team.name: Alberto Vallez
team.content:
He loves trail running and sport fishing.

He is the one behind the development of self-service totems for music festivals and hotels, helping customers pay or top-up their virtual wallets.
